features: 【High Precision Optical Sensor】：This is a great mouse for gamers and typists，200-12800DPI gaming-grade sensor responds precisely to movements，125-1000Hz Polling rate，Customize sensitivity settings for the best gaming and design experience.

【Adjustable RGB Lighting】：This RGB mouse features an impressive array of 13 vibrant effects, offering a customizable palette of 16.8 million colors. The lighting dynamically syncs with in-game sounds and music rhythms, delivering an immersive visual experience.

【75g Ultra-Lightweight Design】: The honeycomb structure on the top and bottom of this gaming mouse significantly reduces its overall weight. The unique hollow design prevents excessive sweating during prolonged use. Additionally, the ultra-flexible braided cable is so lightweight that it provides a drag-free wireless feel.

【6 Programmable Buttons】：Ergonomic left and right hand shape，Button function remapping, including 4 configuration editing layers, rapid fire, macro recording, and shortcut key actions，This makes the mouse smarter and meets more needs for different games.
【Customizable Driver Software】: DIERYA X TMKB's powerful driver software you can remap the functions of mouse buttons, record macros, configure editing layers, and customize the Light band RGB.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars One of the best value mice
reviews.reviewText: To be honest I didn’t expect this mouse to be anything special when it only costed around $21. I’ve got to say this mouse is definitely one of the best bang for your buck.I bought this mouse to replace my Razer Basilisk Hyperspeed X. I like the Basilisk series because the shape of those mice really fit my hand well. This mouse has a more flat and round shape and, I’m my opinion, is not that ergonomic. If you have big hands like me, the mouse may not be to comfortable at first. I got used to it after a few days of using the mouse.The side buttons feel cheap. You can press them in further than the actual button press. Has a weird squishy or springy feeling.The build quality is surprisingly good. The mouse has a nice eggshell type finish which feels smooth, but not glossy. The mouse feels pretty sturdy but I have yet to rage and see how much damage it can take. The mouse is somewhat lightweight coming in at 105g as far as I’m aware but I don’t really mind heavy mice. Definitely lighter than the Razer mouse I was using.TL:DR, Very good value! Great gaming that feels well built and responsive with some minor issues that you would expect for the price. Very good mouse if your on a budget or just need a cheap replacement.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars gamers seeking performance and style
reviews.reviewText: The DIERYA Wired Gaming Mouse is a dream for gamers. The honeycomb shell design is not only visually appealing but also functional, keeping my hand comfortable during long gaming sessions. The customizable macros and RGB settings add a personal touch. Highly recommended for gamers seeking performance and style.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had this mouse for a month i really haven't found any problems but the clicking is a little slow but for $15 it a fairly good mouse. I'm pretty surprised that it has a software and it is that good. However the DPI goes by a hundred instead of 50. Also the honeycomb design gives a good look and feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for gaming
reviews.reviewText: It’s a really good mouse. It’s really light m, easy to learn, and really reactive to every game

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good mouse for the price
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a breathable type mouth for a while and i could not afford the other expensive ones so i wanted to give this one a try, ive been gaming with it and its super nice, it feels like really good quality and its also very pretty looking! Its DPI settings are super easy and super fast as well and the colors are nice too. I would reccomend if youre looking for a pretty/nice looking mouse that has the same functions as a much more expensive one for a low price! :))

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works perfectly, looks cool, son loves it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The weight is not accurate
reviews.reviewText: I was kinda disappointed of how heavy the mouse is I thought I was 70 someone grams but it's feels like over 100g The feeling is nice the materials are good if your looking for gaming I would recommend a light mouse but if your just looking for looks then this mouse is for you. I will be selling this mouse because of how heavy it is and replacing this with a lighter mouse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really good has a smooth feel and I really like RGB very cute I love the white color and its really good for gameplays really easy to use. I was really surprised with how good it is for a low budget.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Purchased for my son for his gaming pc and he loves it, easy to use and looks good on his desk, very pleased.

Getetestet wurde hier die verkabeltet Gamingmaus.Die Gamingmaus ist solide und robust verarbeitet. Vom Gewicht her ist die Maus ziemlich leicht und liegt sehr gut in der Hand. Die Maus lässt sich sehr angenehm und einfach bedienden. In der Anwendung ist die Maus schnell und zuverlässig.Die Maus beim Gaming für überzeugende Leistung und gute Effekte.Das Preis- und Leistungsverhältnis passt.
